asgn2Simulators

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn2Simulators.Log

  • public class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to support logging for the Aircraft Simulator
    Author:
    hogan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean SAVE_STATUS 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Log()
      Constructor establishes log files based on the current time in the canonical directory

    • Constructor Detail

      • Log

        public Log()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor establishes log files based on the current time in the canonical directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the log files or BufferedWriters cannot be created

    • Method Detail

      • setPassengerMsg

        public static java.lang.String setPassengerMsg(Passenger p,
                               java.lang.String source,
                               java.lang.String target)
        Helper to set Passenger transition messages
        Parameters:
        p - Passenger making a transition (uses F,J,P,Y)
        source - String holding starting state (uses N,Q,C) - {New,Queued,Confirmed}
        target - String holding finishing state (uses Q,C,R,F) - (Queued,Confirmed,Refused,Flown)
        Returns:
        String containing transition in the form: |(F|J|P|Y):(N|Q|C)>(Q|C|R|F)|

      • setUpgradeMsg

        public static java.lang.String setUpgradeMsg(Passenger p)
        Helper to set Passenger upgrade messages.
        Parameters:
        p - Passenger to be upgraded
        Returns:
        String containing transition in the form: |(J|P|Y)>(F|J|P)|

      • finalise

        public void finalise(Simulator sim)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Log final state information and clean up
        Parameters:
        sim - Simulator being used
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on write or closure failures

      • initialEntry

        public void initialEntry(Simulator sim)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         SimulationException
        Log initial state of the simulation and aircraft Note we grab aircraft from first valid schedule
        Parameters:
        sim - Simulator providing parameters
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on write failures
        SimulationException - See Simulator.getFlights(int)

      • logEntry

        public void logEntry(int time,
            Simulator sim)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     SimulationException
        Log summary entry for each time step Note: Aircraft bookings appear only once Flights have begun
        Parameters:
        time - int holding current simulation time step
        sim - Simulator controlling simulation
        Throws:
        SimulationException - See Simulator.getSummary(int, boolean)
        java.io.IOException - on write failures

      • logQREntries

        public void logQREntries(int time,
                Simulator sim)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Log Queue and Refused Transitions for each time step. Logging controlled by SAVE_STATUS
        Parameters:
        time - int holding current simulation time step
        sim - Simulator controlling simulation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on write failures

      • logFlightEntries

        public void logFlightEntries(int time,
                    Simulator sim)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             SimulationException
        Log Aircraft Transitions for each time step. Logging controlled by SAVE_STATUS
        Parameters:
        time - int holding current simulation time step
        sim - Simulator controlling simulation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on write failures
        SimulationException - See Simulator.getFlights(int)
